name: Leafpress
headline: AI Copilot for Energy Data
description: Leafpress helps large enterprises manage mission-critical energy data.

founders.name: Devishi Jha, Founder
founders.description: Devi dropped out from Harvard with a degree in Computer Science. She worked on the early ESG teams of Sephora, Spotify, and P&G. She is also an ESG mentor at Techstars.

founders.name: Jianna Liu, Founder
founders.description: Jianna graduated from MIT with a degree in computer science. She has worked on the software teams at Meta, DoorDash, Nvidia, and the MIT School of Architecture and Planning.

# **AI-Powered Energy Intelligence**
Energy is mission-critical for ESCOs, AI cloud providers, EV fleets, and enterprises. Our platform optimizes consumption, cuts costs, and ensures reliability where it matters most.
[Book a demo](https://www.leafpress.ai/<https:/calendly.com/leafpress/leafpress-demo-book?month=2024-06>)
Trusted by leading organizations
![Trusted by Johnson Controls](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6663798f01570fb9ffdd2e36/6665f755c1da21fda3b9f2e6_Johnson%20Controls%20logo.webp)![Trusted by Singerman Real Satete](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6663798f01570fb9ffdd2e36/6665f755aaf61f0f922ef2ac_Singerman-logo.webp)![Trusted by Colliers International](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6663798f01570fb9ffdd2e36/6665f75473e9ca486e2b1d6b_colliers-logo.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6663798f01570fb9ffdd2e36/666baea53a937a8914748862_hero-main-img.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6663798f01570fb9ffdd2e36/6669e67c4c2581fdbd80fd1b_Home-hero_top-left.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6663798f01570fb9ffdd2e36/6669e67c374cbb41b879a652_Home-hero_top-right.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6663798f01570fb9ffdd2e36/6669e67c02d647ea73f1115f_Home-hero_bottom-left.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6663798f01570fb9ffdd2e36/6669e67c8fe6be3490fa77b0_Home-hero_bottom-right.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6663798f01570fb9ffdd2e36/6669e8954256f69d88c36535_home-hero-img-m.webp)
## **Energy Data Is Mission-Critical. We Ensure You Collect It.**
### Before Leafpress...
  * Manually reading millions of utility data points.
  * Limited Sync to utility accounts.
  * Unable to detect spikes or anomalies in data.
  * Incorrect synchronization Energy Star Portfolio Manager.


### After Leafpress
  * Read data in any format (ex. handwritten notes and 75+ languages).
  * Sync data from **any** utility account.
  * Comprehensive data analytics.
  * Automated, two-way synchronization with Energy Star Portfolio Manager.


## **How It Works**
![Leafpress demo, see how leafpress works in 60s!](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6663798f01570fb9ffdd2e36/666603e9c253dd00e5b5a469_demo.gif)### [See how Leafpress works in 60s!](https://www.leafpress.ai/<#>)### [See how it works!](https://www.leafpress.ai/<#>)
### AI Data Processor
Works with international data and your trickiest bills.
60 seconds, and your bill is read. It’s like magic.
### AI Utility Sync
Any utility account, not just accounts on some list.
Electricity, gas, water, waste, fleet - you name it.
### Never-before-seen Analytics
Single pane of glass analytics across portfolio
Cut 25% on energy across your portfolio.
[Book a demo](https://www.leafpress.ai/<https:/calendly.com/leafpress/leafpress-demo-book?month=2024-06>)
## **The Leafpress Advantage**
90% 
‍time saved
100%
‍of data collected across portfolio
50%
reduction in costs
[Book a demo](https://www.leafpress.ai/<https:/calendly.com/leafpress/leafpress-demo-book?month=2024-06>)
## Featured in
[![Featured in TechCrunch](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6663798f01570fb9ffdd2e36/6668ce984aaacb34db2d30d2_techcrunch-logo.webp)](https://www.leafpress.ai/<https:/techcrunch.com/2023/09/06/ycombinator-demo-day-one-summer-2023/>)[![Featured in Forbes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6663798f01570fb9ffdd2e36/6668ce990f4b6318fbd1793a_forbes-logo.webp)](https://www.leafpress.ai/<https:/www.forbes.com/profile/leafpress/>)[![Featured in Y Combinator](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6663798f01570fb9ffdd2e36/6668ce98955452d3be9950c5_YC-logo.webp)](https://www.leafpress.ai/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/leafpress>)[![Featured in Cretech](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6663798f01570fb9ffdd2e36/6668ce9995916471dfde0460_cretech-logo.webp)](https://www.leafpress.ai/<https:/plus.cretech.com/videos/virtual-demo-day-september-2023-leafpress>)[![Featured in Blueprint](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6663798f01570fb9ffdd2e36/6668ce99675d377aa28dc3e4_blueprint-logo.webp)](https://www.leafpress.ai/<https:/blueprintvegas.com/speakers/>)
## **We Didn't Stop There**
We have exclusive new features we’re rolling out to new customers. Currently invite-only.
### BMS Integration
Integrate with any BMS system and obtain granular, real-time analytics.
### Premium Analytics
Gain access to forecasting capabilities, weather normalized data, and emissions analytics.
### Industry Insights
Monitor Your Energy Performance Against Competitors.
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
## FAQ
### What Types of Data Do You Work With?
We work with any type of utility data, including but not limited to electricity, gas, water, waste, and district heating. Our AI can process data in any format and language, ensuring comprehensive coverage for all your utility data needs. Additionally, we offer seamless synchronization to any utility account, not just the more popular ones. This means you can integrate data from local, regional, and niche utility providers, giving you a complete and accurate view of your utility usage.
### How Do You Think About Security?
Security is our top priority. We are SOC 2 compliant, ensuring that we adhere to the highest standards of data security and privacy. We work entirely with enterprise customers, providing robust security measures to protect your sensitive utility data. Our systems are designed to safeguard your information from unauthorized access, ensuring that your data is always secure and confidential.
### Can You Be Used With My Existing Data Tools / Environmental Software?
Yes, absolutely! Our universal AI is designed to seamlessly integrate with your existing data tools and environmental software. We understand the importance of interoperability and strive to ensure that integrating our solution with your current systems is smooth and hassle-free. Whether you're using legacy systems or onboarding new software, our platform is built to work harmoniously with a wide range of tools, ensuring a seamless experience.
### Energy Is the Top Item on Our Budget. How Will Leafpress Help Me Save Money on My Energy Consumption?
Leafpress helps you save money by leveraging AI-driven analytics to pinpoint inefficiencies and highlight opportunities for optimization. Our platform enables you to:
  * Compare the performance of your best and worst assets.
  * Track and identify energy-saving opportunities.
  * Detect spikes and anomalies in real-time.
  * Gain comprehensive insights into usage patterns.
  * Seamlessly integrate with any utility account and your existing software.


With Leafpress, you can make data-driven decisions to effectively reduce your energy consumption and costs.
### How Will Leafpress Make Me Ready for the Reporting Deadline?
Leafpress ensures you're ready for reporting deadlines by automating and streamlining the process. Our platform provides:
  * **Automated Data Collection:** Accurate AI-driven data collection.
  * **Real-Time Updates:** Seamless synchronization with Energy Star Portfolio Manager.
  * **Comprehensive Analytics:** Detailed insights to meet compliance requirements.
  * **Customizable Reports:** Easily export tailored reports.
  * **Seamless Integration:** Sync with any utility account and existing tools.


With Leafpress, your data is always accurate, up-to-date, and ready for reporting.
## **Read the Latest From Our Blog**
### How to Evaluate a Utility Data Collection Provider | Why Choose Leafpress
Choosing the right utility data collection provider is crucial. Discover why Leafpress's AI solution stands out for accuracy, scalability, and insights.
[Read](https://www.leafpress.ai/</blog/why-choose-leafpress>)
### Leafpress x Salesforce Net Zero Cloud
Leafpress partners with Salesforce Net Zero Cloud to enhance utility data collection and ESG management. Stay tuned for innovative outcomes!
[Read](https://www.leafpress.ai/</blog/leafpress-x-salesforce>)
## **Work Smarter,Not Harder**
Leverage Leafpress to automate and streamline your utility data collection and reporting, saving you time and ensuring accuracy.
[Book a demo](https://www.leafpress.ai/<https:/calendly.com/leafpress/leafpress-demo-book?month=2024-06>)

generated_description:
**Leafpress: Simplifying Energy Data Management with AI**

Founded in 2023 and now a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch S23, Leafpress is making waves in the energy sector with its mission to be the AI Copilot for Energy Data. The company aims to help large enterprises efficiently manage their mission-critical energy data, a need that has grown exponentially in today’s data-driven world.

### What It Does

Leafpress offers an AI-powered platform that specializes in optimizing energy consumption. The platform not only reduces costs but also ensures that organizations can rely on their energy data like never before. What sets Leafpress apart is its ability to read utility data from virtually any format, including handwritten notes and over 75 languages, which opens up a world of possibilities for data integration.

### Key Features

1. **Seamless Data Handling**: Leafpress allows users to sync data from any utility account, ensuring comprehensive coverage for all energy metrics.
2. **AI-Driven Insights**: Its advanced analytics can detect anomalies and spikes in energy consumption, providing actionable insights to drive efficiency.
3. **Automated Reporting**: The platform integrates with popular systems like Energy Star Portfolio Manager to simplify compliance and reporting processes.

### Success Stories

Leafpress has already garnered the trust of prominent organizations like Johnson Controls and Singerman Real Estate, demonstrating its practical impact in real-world applications. The company boasts impressive statistics, such as saving users 90% of the time spent on data management and achieving a 50% reduction in energy costs.

### Future Horizon

Leafpress isn’t resting on its laurels. With innovations like a Business Management System (BMS) integration and enhanced analytics capabilities on the horizon, the company is setting itself up for sustained growth and success. It’s currently invite-only for new features—suggesting that they’re gearing up for big things ahead.

### Meet the Team

Led by a compact yet talented team of two and backed by Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer, Leafpress exhibits agility and a strong vision in the tech startup ecosystem.

### Conclusion

If you’re managing energy data and feeling overwhelmed, Leafpress is your answer. The future of energy management is here, packed with AI innovation that ensures you’re not just keeping up with data but mastering it. Check out more on their website [Leafpress.ai](https://www.leafpress.ai) or book a demo to see the magic for yourself. 

In a world that’s increasingly data-driven, Leafpress is making it easier, smarter, and more efficient for enterprises to consume and manage energy.
